title: PRO packs it in with new Smart Bottle Cage, plus new multi-tools & internal routing tool for new Di2
content:
Shimano just introduced two all-new groups with Ultegra & Dura-Ace. And in typical Shimano fashion, their tool and accessory brand PRO has just dumped a ton of new products to go along with it. Smart Bottle Cage Adding storage to bottle cages is a growing trend, and now PRO is getting in on the action.

The post PRO packs it in with new Smart Bottle Cage, plus new multi-tools & internal routing tool for new Di2 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
